mutants.original_line: result, current_level, next_level, left_to_right = [], deque([root]), deque(), True
mutants.mutated_line: (result, current_level, next_level, left_to_right) = ([], deque([root]), deque(), False)

mutants.original_line: self.children = children if children is not None else []
mutants.mutated_line: self.children = children if children is None else []
